ProjectTitle: Investigation of fixed dose combinations of poorly soluble drugs using amorphous solid dispersions.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 02/12/2024 [REDACTED] Please include samples/materials that you will analyse in the table, these are physical data in the context of a DMP. Please also specify which analysis you will do, this will help to decide how to document data and to find metadata standards and repositories relevant for your data types. [REDACTED] your data has potential for valorization please contact LRD (https://lrd.kuleuven.be/) [REDACTED] Please note that KU [REDACTED] asks for 10 years preservation of all relevant data; the J drive is relatively expensive; the K drive, which is specifically designated for archiving, is a more cost-effective option. [REDACTED] you can find guidance that may help you to decide how to share your data here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
